text: Gilberto dos Santos Gomes (born 24 June 1959 in Mirandela, Bragança District), known simply as Gilberto, is a Portuguese retired footballer who played as a midfielder. ==External links== * * *Portugal stats at Eu-Football * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Primeira Liga players Category:LigaPro players Category:A.D. title: Gilberto Gomes
